ygData.subject: Re: Clerics in Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: An update from your friendly Dwarfen Cleric Vrachit. I finally made level 7! As the previous advice suggested, I finally found a kind L17 cleric named Zebediah
ygData.messageBody:
An update from your friendly Dwarfen Cleric Vrachit. I finally made
level 7! As the previous advice suggested, I finally found a kind L17
cleric named Zebediah who bound me to east Freeport. I managed to help
lead some parties in the east Commonlands and will the final strike on
a Giant Scarab I obtained the 7th order of the Cleric Order. Nothing
much happens there but I had been stuck on 6 so long it was a welcome
change. Now I can't wait til 8 so I can meditate and 9 where I start
getting some cool spells.

Right now I'm trying to raise the coin to purchase a sewing kit so I
can try my hand at making patchwork armor. I'm a little low on the AC
for a Cleric of my size and could certainly use the help. Does anyone
recommend using my coin to buy the higher order armor for now or wait
until higher levels where I can generate a little more coin and just
save my coin now for spells at level 9? Any suggestions are certainly
welcome.

Your humble Cleric,

Vrachit

--- Doc Lotus <doclotus@...> wrote:
> From: Doc Lotus <doclotus@...>
>
> Greetings everyone,
>
> This is your friendly neighborhood Dwarfen Cleric,
> Vrachit. Just wanted
> to say hello and also ask if others are finding it
> as hard as I am from
> level 6 and up. I am 6 now and having hard time
> finding good things to
> kill or parties to kill them will. I am often found
> in freeport but
> spend most of my time in Butcherblock, as it is
> easier to fetch my
> corpse (which I seem to be doing a lot of lately).
>
> Any advice you have for this struggling healer would
> be most
> appreciated.
>
>
>
